ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface MicroscopeInformation

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
MicroscopeInformationRMI
public interface MicroscopeInformation
extends java.rmi.Remote

Author:
Moritz Lang Interface gives access to the configuration of the microscope.

getConfigGroups

java.lang.String[] getConfigGroups()
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                          MicroscopeException
Returns a list of all available config groups (e.g. the channel group). Same as getConfigGroup(true)

Returns:
List of all config groups.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
java.lang.InterruptedException
MicroscopeException

getConfigGroups

java.lang.String[] getConfigGroups(boolean includeSpecialGroups)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                          MicroscopeException
Returns a list of all available config groups (e.g. the channel group).

Parameters:
includeSpecialGroups - True if config groups with a special meaning, e.g. "System", should be included, false if they should be sorted out.
Returns:
List of all config groups.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
java.lang.InterruptedException

getAllowedPropertyValues

java.lang.String[] getAllowedPropertyValues(java.lang.String device,
                                            java.lang.String property)
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                   MicroscopeException,
                                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
Returns all valid values for the specified property. If the array is empty it means that there are no restrictions for values. However, even if all values are allowed it is not guaranteed that all of them will be acually accepted by the device at run time.

Parameters:
device -
property -
Returns:
All valid values for the specified property
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException
